Name: Cross-flow
Description: An impulse turbine used in smaller hydroelectric sites with power outputs between 5 and 100 kW. Known also as Banki-Mitchell or Ossberger turbines.

Name: Francis
Description: A reaction (propeller) turbine commonly used in medium- or large-scale hydroelectric plants for head heights as low as 2 m and as high as 300 m.

Name: Kaplan
Description: A reaction (propeller) turbine with axial-flow and adjustable blades. Most useful for use in cams with large volumes of flow.

Name: Pelton
Description: An impulse turbine commonly used in facilities with head height greater than 300 m.
